sentences.sContent: Every article on the breakfast table was fetched away with a hideous crash.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every article on the breakfast table was fetched away with a hideous crash.
sentences.sCn: 早餐桌上的每件物品随着可怕的撞击声移动了位置。

sentences.sContent: People might think you have a hideous bowel disease or perhaps a fiber fetish.
sentences.sContent_eng: People might think you have a hideous bowel disease or perhaps a fiber fetish.
sentences.sCn: 人们可能会认为你有一个可怕的肠道疾病或者纤维恋物癖。

sentences.sContent: Don't be afraid to ask someone that same question whose color you think is hideous, so you know where not to go.
sentences.sContent_eng: Don't be afraid to ask someone that same question whose color you think is hideous, so you know where not to go.
sentences.sCn: 不要害怕问同一个问题关于一些人谁的颜色你认为可怕，因此你才知道什么地方不应该去做。

words.tran: 可怕地；非常讨厌地；荒谬可笑地

trans.tranCn: 骇人听闻的, 可怕的
